DESCRIPTION: Creatures are Afflicted when they have 1 or more of the following effects, #yWeak, #yVulnerable, #yPoison, #yGoop, #ySoulfire, and #ySoul #ySnare
When Applied, enemy loses HP equal to their current #ySoul #ySnare. Increase this by 1 whenever another #yAffliction is applied, does not trigger itself.
You Start every Combat with a torch Head that intercepts attack damage while it has Protection. if dead, it reignits in 2 turns with 5 HP. Can be #yCommanded, dealing 6 damage by default.
Your specified minion attacks the listed Target.
When a #yCollected Monster dies, after combat it's #yCollectible will appear in a separate card reward, no more then 3 #yCollectibles can appear.
#yCollectibles are placed here in combat. Contains 4 #yLucky #yWick at the start of a run.
This card starts in the #yCollection in combat
This card returns to the #yCollection in when played.

A card in #yStasis gains a turn counter equal to its cost plus #b1. NL Turn counter is reduced by #b1 at the start of your turn. NL When the counter reaches #b0, it is returned to your hand and costs #b0 until played.
The next attack deals #b1 more damage per #yGoop, removing all #yGoop and triggering any #yConsume effects.
